member.name: M:GVC.Shifts.API.Controllers.ShiftsController.CreateChannelRecord(System.String)
member.summary: Create Channel Record in Channels Table from CSV file. the CSV file should contain the following: DisplayName, Description, TeamId

member.name: M:GVC.Shifts.API.Controllers.ShiftsController.CreateGroupRecord(System.String)
member.summary: Create Group Record in Groups Table from CSV file. the CSV file should contain the following: GroupDisplayName, GroupDescription, MainEnabled, MailNickName

member.name: M:GVC.Shifts.API.Controllers.ShiftsController.CreateSchedulerRecord(System.String)
member.summary: Create Scheduler Record in Scheduler Table from CSV file. the CSV file should contain the following: TeamId, ShopName, IsActive

member.name: M:GVC.Shifts.API.Controllers.ShiftsController.CreateShiftsecord(System.String)
member.summary: Create Shifts Record in Shifts Table from CSV file the CSV file should contain the following: PersonnelId,ShopId,AreaId, SharedShiftName,SharedShiftNote,SharedShiftStartDateTime,SharedShiftEndDateTime,SharedShifttheme, DraftShiftName,DraftShiftNote,DraftShiftStartDateTime,DraftShiftEndDateTime,DraftShifttheme

member.name: M:GVC.Shifts.API.Controllers.ShiftsController.CreateUsersRecord(System.String)
member.summary: Create Users Record in Users Table from CSV file the CSV file should contain the following: Id,GivenName,SurName,UserPrincipalName,Email

member.name: M:GVC.Shifts.API.Controllers.ShiftsController.CreateContractRecord(System.String)
member.summary: Create Contract Record in Contract Table from CSV file the CSV file should contain the following: UserId,WorkingHours

member.name: M:GVC.Shifts.API.Controllers.ShiftsController.CreateLeavesRecord(System.String)
member.summary: Create Leaves Record in Leaves Table from CSV file the CSV file should contain the following: LeaveType,FromDate,ToDate,NoOfHours,NoOfDays
